page.title: 17HOLIDAYS:THORNTON CLEVELEYS
page.content: TODAY MOST PEOPLE GO ABROAD FOR THEIR HOLIDAYS,USUALLY FOR WARM WEATHER AND GOOD FOOD,BUT ENGLAND IS STILL A LOVELY PLACE TO GO FOR YOUR HOLIDAYS BUT WHEN YOU LIVE THERE YOU DON'T SEE IT AS A HOLIDAY BUT IT DOES HAVE NICE FOOD!IN THE FORTIES PEOPLE NEVER WENT ABROAD UNLESS THEY WERE VERY RICH.I GO TO PLACES IN EUROPE .I HAVE BEEN TO:FRANCE,SPAIN,GERMANY,NORWAY,AUSTRIA AND THIS AUGUST I AM GOING TO ENMARK.PEOPLE IN THOSE TIMES WOULD NOT GO TO SUCH PLACES. I LIKE TRAVELLING IN BOATS AND PLANES BUT NOT IN CARS.I AM VERY GLAD I HAVE THE OPPORTUNITY TO TRAVEL ABROAD. I WONDER IF PEOPLE IN THE FUTURE WILL TRAVEL ABOUT THE SOLAR SYSTEM AS WE TRAVEL ABOUT THE WORLD. BY{KIRSTEN BREARLEY,STANAH SCHOOL.}
